{{TPRGT Story
|character          = Razor
|date               = 2023-09-09
|zh                 = 
;今天是雷泽的生日哦，我们快去为他庆祝吧！
:'''派蒙：'''哇&mdash;&mdash;那颗星星好亮，真好看！
:'''雷泽：'''湖里，也有。好看。
:'''旅行者：'''水面上也亮晶晶的。
:'''派蒙：'''星落湖的名字说不定就是这么来的呢。
:'''旅行者：'''也有诗歌说，是星星落到地上，才有了湖泽。
:'''旅行者：'''雷泽更喜欢哪一种说法？
|dialogue_review_zh = 「也有诗歌说，是星星落到地上，才有了湖泽。」
|en                 = 
;Today is [[Razor]]'s birthday, let's go and celebrate with him!
:'''Paimon:''' Wow&mdash; That star is really bright! It's so pretty!
:'''Razor:''' In lake, another one. Very pretty.
:'''Traveler:''' Even the surface of the water is glittering.
:'''Paimon:''' That might even be how [[Starfell Lake]] got its name. 
:'''Traveler:''' Poems also say, lake created when stars fell onto ground.
:'''Traveler:''' Which legend does Razor like more?
|dialogue_review_en = "Poems also say, lake created when stars fell onto ground."
